description: Targus Simply Basic Cover for iPad® 3Simply Basic CoverMinimalism Never Looked So GoodYour iPad goes where you go – whether you’re running errands, going to class, or simply lounging around at home. The Simply Basic Cover is a slim and light solution for the everyday iPad user looking for a minimalist case.Easy-to-CleanThe occasional coffee spill or knocked over juice cup is inevitable, so cleaning up messes should be quick and easy. The Simply Basic Cover is made of a durable, easy-to-clean textured material that is water resistant so with a wipe of a paper towel, spills will be a thing of the past with this hard-wearing case.Quick and easy clean upDurable & easy-to-cleantwill materialSpills will be athing of the pastForm-fitting and ProtectiveLined with a quality jersey material inside, your iPad is protected from dust and scratches. The form-fitting design allows you to have easy access to all ports without having to remove your iPad. For added protection, the back cover of the case is dual lined to provide extra security and is designed to help slide the iPad in and out easily. The back cover easily folds back while in use, allowing you to watch movies, play games or read the latest news without any strain.Quality jersey material insideEasy access to all portsDual lined to provide extrasecurityMagnetic On/Off FeatureThe Simply Basic Cover’s custom fit keeps your iPad nice and snug while transporting. The magnetic on/off feature also helps conserve battery life by putting your iPad to sleep – there’s no need to press any buttons!Magnetic on/off featureKeep your iPad nice and snugConserve your iPad battery life.GreyNote { font-family : Helvetica;
